archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.4.3e: e) from IT sources relevant to the information security incident (e.g. active, temporary and deleted files on storage media; email or internet usage; memory caches; and event logs)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
